iterator_facade.h File Reference

Defines a class which exposes the public interface that all iterators accessable from the host and device must implement. Based on Boost's iterator_facade class. More...

#include <thrust/detail/config.h>

Detailed Description

Defines a class which exposes the public interface that all iterators accessable from the host and device must implement. Based on Boost's iterator_facade class.
